definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Many people com tributed for the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 許多人向水災災民捐款。

sentences.english: Indah has the highest number of flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 運達的水災災民的人數最多。

sentences.english: Since the flood arrived in Bangkok, the 52-year-old has been working seven days a week.
sentences.chinese: 自曼谷發生水災以來，52歲的素普朗每週工作7天。

sentences.english: The official was dismissed from office because he feathered his own nest with the relief fund for flood.
sentences.chinese: 那位官員被解除職務，因爲他拿水災救濟金營私自肥。

sentences.english: They sandbagged their homes to keep out floods.
sentences.chinese: 他們在房屋周圍墊上沙袋以抵禦水災。

sentences.english: We must co-ordinate our efforts to help the flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 我們應該同心協力以援助遭水災的災民。

sentences.english: There were landslides and a flood last week.
sentences.chinese: 上週發生土石流和水災。

sentences.english: B Indah has the highest number of flood victims.
sentences.chinese: 運達的水災災民的人數最多。

sentences.english: The typhoon, referred to locally as Milenyo, caused floods and landslides that have displaced some 5,500 people.
sentences.chinese: 颱風造成的水災和塌方使大約5500人無家可歸。

sentences.english: Like wise in 1932 he worked on floodrelief in Hubei Province.
sentences.chinese: 1932年，他又來到湖北省進行水災救濟工作。

sentences.english: They have founded that the flood and flood area ratio variation is big according to flood risk analysis.
sentences.chinese: 水災風險分析中洪災和澇災面積比值變化較大。

sentences.english: The heavy rains brought about a severe flood.
sentences.chinese: 一連串的豪雨導致了嚴重的水災。

sentences.english: The country can't afford another flood.
sentences.chinese: 該國經不起再受一次水災了。

sentences.english: The footbridge washed away during the floods.
sentences.chinese: 人行橋在水災中沖走了。

sentences.english: To observe the modern history by the study of harness the Huanghe River and the Cannel and society relief and help.
sentences.chinese: 通過黃運水災治理及救助的研究，來觀察近代社會。

sentences.english: Afraid contract balance unimplemented owing flood up country.
sentences.chinese: 由於全國到處發生水災，所餘合同恐無法完成。

definition: to break out (of disease etc)/to suddenly get rich (or prominent)
